attributes.action: Abolish the "NSDR" National Saff Dismissal Register
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NSDR is yet another infrigngement on free speech and the right to a private life in this country. The fact that entries in this database will be purely subjective and have no legal grounding, i.e. no police caution/conviction or court of law will be involved, and yet could ruin someones life, this must be stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
